mapper.select: SELECT address, room_lowprice, rate, hotel_class, information, hotel_discount, hotel_code, hotel_name, nation_name, city_name FROM td_hotel h, td_nation n, td_city c where h.nation_code = n.nation_code and h.city_code = c.city_code

SELECT address, room_lowprice, rate, hotel_class, information, hotel_discount, h.hotel_code, hotel_name, nation_name, city_name, hotel_core_info, hotel_precautions, hotel_checktime, hotel_etc FROM td_hotel h, td_nation n, td_city c, td_hotel_detailinfo i where h.nation_code = n.nation_code and h.city_code = c.city_code and h.hotel_code = i.hotel_code and h.hotel_code = #{hotel_code}
SELECT room_idx, room_peoplenum, room_peoplenum_k, room_bed, room_price, room_name, hotel_code FROM td_room where hotel_code = #{hotel_code}
SELECT hf_name FROM TD_HOTEL_INFO i, TD_HOTEL_FACILITY f WHERE i.HF_IDX = f.HF_IDX AND HOTEL_CODE = #{room_idx}
SELECT ROWNUM, REVIEW_IDX, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_RATE, MEMBER_ID, TO_CHAR(REVIEW_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS REVIEW_DATE FROM TD_REVIEW WHERE HOTEL_CODE = #{hotel_code} ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC
